<Text: Paul Roundhill:  He is best known for his association with musician Pete Doherty, acting as his self-styled literary agent and previously running the website balachada.com (Bala Chadha being street slang for crack cocaine from the Bengali translation of "good white"), which was closed by Doherty in May 2006.>
